title: Multivariate Time Series Anomaly Detection by Capturing Coarse-Grained Intra-and Inter-Variate Dependencies

abstract: Multivariate time series anomaly detection is essential for failure management in web application operations, as it directly influences the effectiveness and timeliness of implementing remedial or preventive measures. This task is often framed as a semi …

abstract: This paper presents\textbf {FreEformer}, a simple yet effective model that leverages a\textbf {Fre} quency\textbf {E} nhanced Trans\textbf {former} for multivariate time series forecasting. Our work is based on the assumption that the frequency spectrum …
